// scene
export const CANVAS_WIDTH = 800
export const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 800
export const leftRightMargin = 40
export const topBottomMargin = 40

// bird
export const maxSpeed = 300
export const minSpeed = 5
export const RADIUS = 10

// updating bird's posiiton/velocity
export const sepFactor = 0.05
export const alignFactor = 0.05
export const cohesionFactor = 0.0005

// turning screen edge rate
export const turnFactor = 0.2

// others
export const BIRDS_NUM = 5
export const nearbyMaxDistance = 200
